title: DPM/FM Dar expresses deep grief over death of school children in Khuzdar terrorist attack
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 21 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar Wednesday expressed his deep grief over the death of school children in a terrorist attack in Khuzdar, Balochistan.
“Deeply saddened by the dastardly terrorist attack by Indian proxies on a school bus in Khuzdar targeting innocent children, 3 of whom embraced martyrdom with many critically injured. While our prayers go out for the departed souls and their families, the planners & orchestrators of this heinous terrorist attack shall be brought to justice,” the DPM/FM posted on X handle.
https://x.com/MIshaqDar50/status/1925205679314235599
